titleStmt.title: Every mans case, or, Lawyers routed In seven treatises, the titles whereof you may find in the ensuing page. Written by John Jones, Gentl prisoner in the Fleet.
titleStmt.author: Jones, John, of Neyath, Brecon.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold at the Cock in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
